description: Did this in March 2017, in the snow, after spending 4 days, 4 nights in the park at Fight Meadows.Straight line distance from Fight Meadow to Wells Gray Ranch is only 9 kms, but walking out is 19, and down 1150 m.Headed south 10 kms to Philip Lake, very little descent, got only 1 km closer to WGR. Then, from Philip Lake, down switchback trail for 3 kms, and from Philip Lake PL, another 7 kms to WGR, on old logging road.
directions: Closest town is Clearwater BC, on Hway 5, approx 1.5 hours north of Kamloops. Contact Wells Gray Adventures at 1-888-754-8735, or visit www.skihike.com, in Clearwater.
title: Wells Gray Park, Fight Meadow to Wells Gray Ranch
